title: Understanding CSC and CSP
text: Comprehensive Community Services (CSC) and Community Support Programs (CSP) are designed to help individuals maintain independence while receiving necessary support. Think about what kind of services might be included in such programs.

title: Key Features of CSC and CSP
text: Consider the types of support that would enable someone to live independently in their own home. What kind of assistance might they need to manage daily activities and health care?

hintAnswer: offer intensive case management services that allow a person to live in their own home with the support of trained personnel who assist them with transportation to $$health-care$$ provider appointments, running errands, peer support services, and care coordination
title: Identifying Services Offered
text: What services do CSC and CSP provide to help individuals live independently?
choices: one in which the client receives the most effective treatment that places the fewest restrictions on their life

offer intensive case management services that allow a person to live in their own home with the support of trained personnel who assist them with transportation to $$health-care$$ provider appointments, running errands, peer support services, and care coordination
more convenient, less expensive, encourage $$longer-term$$ $$\frac{client}{counselor}$$ relationships, keep the client working, and are more amenable to family support
